example.name: passive
example.text: [Wang Laboratories Inc. , Lowell , , [*]beset [*] by declining demand for its computers , reported a $ 62.1 million [*U*] , 38-cents-a-share loss in its first quarter ended Sept. 30 .
example.arg: by declining demand for its computers
